TRIGGERED_ABILITY.TRIGGER: local chosen_opponent = ObjectDC():Get_PlayerPtr(0) if chosen_opponent ~= nil and CountCardsInHand( chosen_opponent ) < 3 then return PlayersUpkeep( chosen_opponent ) else return false end
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local chosen_opponent = ObjectDC():Get_PlayerPtr(0) local source = EffectSource() if source == nil then source = Object() end if chosen_opponent ~= nil then local damage = 3 - CountCardsInHand( chosen_opponent ) if damage > 0 then chosen_opponent:DealDamage( damage, source ) end end
